import axios from 'axios' import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const Login = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const[Email,setEmail]=useState('') const[Password,setPassword]=useState('') const LoginHandler = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() try { const res = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/User/login',{Email,Password}) toast.success(res.data.Message) localStorage.setItem("UserToken",res.data.tokensign) navigate('/pro') } catch (error) { alert(error.response.data.Message) } } return ( <>






Login Portal

setEmail(e.target.value)} value={Email} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Username" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={Password} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Password" />
Dont have an account ? Click here

Admin Login

) } export default Login
